In order to provide your reviewers the opportunity to get recognition for their reviews on Publons, please register your interest with Publons either at this link or by emailing Publons. You will then be provided with access to the partner dashboard where you will find the integration set-up instructions by clicking on Instructions in the navigation bar.

To enable the plugin fill in the fields below

Once you have enabled the plugin, the option for Reviewers to receive recognition for their review will appear on the review submission page.

If the reviewer has opted to receive recognition for their review, upon submission, data will be securely transmitted to Publons and the reviewer will be sent an email (to the email address they have registered with the journal) containing a link to claim their review.

When they follow this link the Reviewer will be asked to sign up to Publons and the review will be added to the reviewer's account. Reviewers can select "Automatically add reviews from partnered journals" in their Publons settings to obviate this claiming step.

By default, Publons doesn't publish the content of reviews. However, if both the journal and Reviewer allow it, Publons will publish the full review text once the article has been published.

The 'Exported Reviews' tab will show you the list of the reviews exported to Publons.
